TextBody:
Hello Andrei,

The issue is caused by rsync which is checked in the CAP policy. From the logs we could see more than 14000 scans and almost all of them are rsync related.
When the user is building apps with Xcode and in this process, rsync is used to copy files from one location to another (the files that are built/generated are the ones copied). If rsync is checked in the policy (and it is) the EPP client has to scan the files. If there is any confidential content in the files, the files will be blocked. So, the file copy will fail and eventually the build will fail as well.

As this is the expected behavior of the EPP Client in this situation where rsync is monitored by the EPP Client, our dev's recommendation would be to remove rsync from the policy assigned to developers.

Best regards,
Emil
